top.title: Venezuelan Nobel Peace Prize winner presents her medal to Trump
top.summary: Trump thanked Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado, calling it "a wonderful gesture of mutual respect".

top.title: Iran authorities demanding large sums for return of protesters' bodies, BBC told
top.summary: Multiple sources have told BBC Persian that security forces will not release bodies unless relatives hand over money.

top.title: European military personnel arrive in Greenland as Trump says US needs island
top.summary: France says a small military contingent has arrived and more forces will be there in the coming days.

top.title: X to stop Grok AI from undressing images of real people after backlash
top.summary: Grok will no longer allow users to remove clothing from images of real people in jurisdictions where it is illegal.

top.title: No 10 welcomes reports X is addressing Grok deepfakes
top.summary: The use of the AI tool to digitally undress women has sparked a backlash as well as intervention from the government and regulator.

top.title: Honey, I shrunk the data centres: Is small the new big?
top.summary: Huge data centres are being built to handle AI computing but some experts say they aren't necessary.
